policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
  <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">

    <!-- Set a simple context variable -->
    <L7p:SetVariable>
      <L7p:Base64Expression>false</L7p:Base64Expression>
      <L7p:Expression>hello Api 5</L7p:Expression>
      <L7p:VariableName>service_specific_var</L7p:VariableName>
    </L7p:SetVariable>

    <!-- Forward W3C Trace Context headers on the outbound REQUEST (Elastic APM correlation) -->
    <L7p:ManageTransportProperties>
      <L7p:TargetMessage>REQUEST</L7p:TargetMessage>
      <L7p:Properties>
        <L7p:Property>
          <L7p:Action>ADD_OR_REPLACE</L7p:Action>
          <L7p:Name>traceparent</L7p:Name>
          <L7p:Value>${request.http.header.traceparent}</L7p:Value>
        </L7p:Property>
        <L7p:Property>
          <L7p:Action>ADD_OR_REPLACE</L7p:Action>
          <L7p:Name>tracestate</L7p:Name>
          <L7p:Value>${request.http.header.tracestate}</L7p:Value>
        </L7p:Property>
      </L7p:Properties>
    </L7p:ManageTransportProperties>

    <!-- Add a gateway-generated request id to the upstream REQUEST -->
    <L7p:ManageTransportProperties>
      <L7p:TargetMessage>REQUEST</L7p:TargetMessage>
      <L7p:Properties>
        <L7p:Property>
          <L7p:Action>ADD</L7p:Action>
          <L7p:Name>AMG-Request-Id</L7p:Name>
          <L7p:Value>${requestId}</L7p:Value>
        </L7p:Property>
      </L7p:Properties>
    </L7p:ManageTransportProperties>

    <!-- Your original routing assertion (left intact) -->
    <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
      <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="http://app-3-java.test-apps.svc:8080/up"/>
      <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
        <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
        <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
          <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
            <L7p:Name stringValue="Cookie"/>
          </L7p:item>
          <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
            <L7p:Name stringValue="SOAPAction"/>
          </L7p:item>
        </L7p:Rules>
      </L7p:RequestHeaderRules>
      <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
        <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
        <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
      </L7p:RequestParamRules>
      <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
        <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
        <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
          <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
            <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/>
          </L7p:item>
        </L7p:Rules>
      </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules>
      <L7p:SamlAssertionVersion intValue="2"/>
    </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>

    <!-- Add an ISO-8601 UTC timestamp to the client RESPONSE -->
    <L7p:ManageTransportProperties>
      <L7p:TargetMessage>RESPONSE</L7p:TargetMessage>
      <L7p:Properties>
        <L7p:Property>
          <L7p:Action>ADD_OR_REPLACE</L7p:Action>
          <L7p:Name>AMG-Timestamp</L7p:Name>
          <L7p:Value>${gateway.time.yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'}</L7p:Value>
        </L7p:Property>
      </L7p:Properties>
    </L7p:ManageTransportProperties>

    <!-- Include your shared policy fragment -->
    <L7p:IncludePolicy>
      <L7p:PolicyGuid>a9f7163b-d17a-42e8-9b75-855ca6f67c08</L7p:PolicyGuid>
      <L7p:PolicyName>Generic API Template</L7p:PolicyName>
    </L7p:IncludePolicy>

  </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
